name: Pong Functions
description:
This game was made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 37

My version of the classic Pong: this time the walls are mathematical functions!

Player 1 plays with [W][S] vs the AI or a Player two [Up][Down]

It should be compatible with non Querty keyboards aswell. Enjoy!

After the jam I'll probably update it to allow custom user functions.
